fetch_dicts.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'aaa_dict' || doc.owner == 'system_config' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.name, doc.owner); }

fetch_system_dicts.map: function(doc) { if (doc.pvt_type != 'aaa_dict' || doc.owner != 'system_config' || doc.pvt_deleted) return; emit(doc.name, doc.owner); }
